lead_paragraph: Officer Marco Proano has been indicted in the 2013 shooting of two black teenagers, who survived.

headline.print_headline: Chicago Officer Faces Federal Charges in Shooting on Video
headline.main: Federal Charges for Chicago Officer in Shooting Caught on Video

snippet: Officer Marco Proano has been indicted in the 2013 shooting of two black teenagers, who survived....
abstract: Chicago Police Officer Marco Proano is indicted on federal criminal charges for shooting two black teenagers in 2013; both teens survived encounter, recorded on video, in which Proano fired weapon into stolen car as it moved away from him during traffic stop.
